name: ExpandableOverlay
description: A component that presents content on top of the invoking screen using an overlay

props.name: expandableContent
props.description: The content to render inside the expandable modal/dialog

props.name: useDialog
props.description: Whether to use a dialog as expandable container (by default the container will be a full screen modal)

props.name: modalProps
props.description: The props to pass to the modal expandable container

props.name: showTopBar
props.description: Whether to render a modal top bar (relevant only for modal)

props.name: topBarProps
props.description: The modal top bar props to pass on

props.name: renderCustomOverlay
props.description: A custom overlay to render instead of Modal or Dialog components

props.name: dialogProps
props.description: The props to pass to the dialog expandable container (when useDialog is true)

props.name: migrateDialog
props.description: Whether to use the new Dialog implementation
